channel.title: Error when running
channel.description:
I randomly get this error when I run my server. It was working fine until today.
[code]Loaded clipmap in 88ms. [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: Launching InsidiaX... [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: java.io.IOExcep tion: Unable to establish loopback connection [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:106 ) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Me thod) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl.<init>(PipeImpl.java:122) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(SelectorProv iderImpl.java:27) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Pipe.java:133) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.<init>(WindowsSelector Impl.java:104) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Windo wsSelectorProvider.java:26) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Selector.open(Selector.java:209) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.s tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.b ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:154) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: Caused by: java.net.SocketException: Permission denied: conne ct [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Native Method) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.connect(SocketChannelImp l.java:507) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at java.nio.channels.SocketChannel.open(SocketChannel.ja va:146) [9/26/11 7:14 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:78)
[9/26/11 7:14 PM]: ... 10 more Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
